item.title: Blender + Aave = ❤️
item.description: Each Blender pool is likely to amass non-negigible amounts of assets. The pool sizes will probably remain below the sizes of lending/borrowing and exchange protocols, yet its hard to estimate their resulting sizes. By observing Tornado Cash’s contracts, you can see that the 100 ETH pool amounted at an all-time-high to about 6 million USD. One way to put those dormant funds to work, is to use a lending platform.
